review_text:
Our stay was comfortable enough to make us want to book this place again when we visit Lafayette in the future.
Cathryn was responsive in a timely manner and extremely cooperative. Cannot complain of anything whatsoever!
This home was so nice! Very clean, homey, & had the cutest decor! Will definitely be going back.

Everything was pretty good during our stay! It was pretty well cleaned and layout was nice, easy to find, and instructions were clear on getting in. Very cute place!! The only thing bothersome was odd stains on the mattresses (I check the mattresses *everywhere* I go for bedbugs etc) and there were also ants and other bugs, primarily in the bathroom, however it seems to be an older home so that just comes with the territory! Our stay wasn’t long as we were just passing through, but it is close to a lot of places to eat and a comfortable place. Overall Cathryn was very proactive in reaching out, communicated well, and her place was nice! Thanks for a great stay!

This property was nothing short of amazing!!! Cathryn furnishes the entire home with Myers products (body wash, shampoo and conditioner, laundry soap, cleaning supplies and so much more!!! The home is beautiful on both the outside and inside! I like how Cathryn had dolls, books, games, coffee, sausage biscuits and PLENTY of large bath towels. The home was tucked back in a quite neighborhood that was quite and safe for my kids. I feel this house was perfect for my family of 6!! We had plenty of room and space. While in Indiana I attended my graduation at purdue, this property was the perfect distance from the college. My teens walked to a beautiful park and were able to fish. They caught a bunch of bass and blue gill. Indiana had a large selection of restaurants and attractions to keep us busy.
I highly recommend this property if looking to stay in the area. If anything was needed or had a q on recommendations, Cathyrine was a message away!! Let me add she is kind!! Enjoy Indiana ♡
Such an adorable place! We were here for mom’s weekend. The moms loved it and we even did a puzzle together! Would definitely stay here again.

From the moment we opened the front door it felt like home away from home.
Beautiful space and great neighborhood. Close to restaurants and grocery stores but in a quieter neighborhood. Cathryn was super helpful and responsive.

Lafayette is a nice area! The patio fire pit and indoor electric fireplace were nice touches! I enjoyed having a morning fire outside and listening to the birds and watching the butterflies! The home is cozy, has a washer & dryer, and provided everything I needed (even razors :)). The book library was outstanding - great idea! I picked a couple random books and also got some reading In during my stay!
Thank you for a nice stay
Great value, easy commute to Purdue. Kitchen was well stocked and the shower in the master suite was very nice with great water pressure.
everything was good. we had a short stay so literally slept and left. But house was spacious, had everything one may need for comfortable living. Kitchen was equipped. Nothing to complain.

As a host, Cathryn went above and beyond to accommodate us for of our groups stay.
Beautiful home, amazing kitchen space and great backyard patio. Highly recommend if you’re looking for a place to stay in Lafayette.

The location of the house worked out great for our stay for the conference at Purdue. The house was clean and well organized and had all the amenities that were needed. I would recommend this house to other co-workers that will be attending future events at Purdue.
We enjoyed our stay, the cottage was very nice and clean. Cathryn was also very helpful and responsive!

In town with a friend to visit our kids at Purdue. Cathryn's place was an easy, short drive from campus.
Is a spacious and comfortable 2BR, 2BA with plenty of room to stretch out. Nice open plan with dining area, living area w/ TV and a sizable kitchen with all the appliances you need. Cathryn provided all of the necessities, including complimentary Keurig coffee pods for us.
House is at the end of a cul de sac, so was quiet with off street parking and good exterior lighting for arriving at night.
Would definitely stay there again.

Cathryn was easily the kindest Airbnb host I've ever booked with. Her home was spacious, with plenty of room and plenty of beds for our crew. I'll book it every time I'm in Lafayette if Cathryn will have us. Book it now!

We felt that the stay was great and exceeded most expectations. The decor was cute, the sleeping arrangements were comfortable and well planned. The bathrooms contained cute little extra touches such as toothbrushes, toothpaste, and make up wipes. The towels were neatly displayed, as well. The decor was modern and had a relaxing feel when you walked into the home. The beds were extremely comfortable. The area felt safe and quiet. We would definitely stay here again.

We had a great stay at Cathryn’s! She was clear with directions about checking in, was very flexible with the check out time, and was responsive.
The house feels private and is comfortable, in a quiet neighborhood and is tastefully decorated. Beds are comfortable. About 10 minute drive to Purdue.
Would stay again!

Catherine was great! We wanted to watch the Super Bowl & she set up a subscription for us so we didn’t miss the game!
We loved the place! Super spacious for the 3 of us. Would definitely stay there again! Very clean & free of clutter!
Cathryn’s place is lovely, comfortable, and clean. She was wonderful to communicate with. We would definitely stay here again!

We enjoyed our stay at this home for the one night we stopped in the area. The home was exactly as described, designed nicely, very spacious for our group, comfy beds and located in a lovely neighborhood. Cathryn was also very kind and responsive! Our only hang-up was that parts of the home needed more attention with cleaning.
The place looked even better in person!

Really enjoyed our stay at Cathryn’s place for a Purdue basketball game. Cathryn was very responsive and provided an early check-in time that allowed us to drop off our stuff and go explore campus comfortably. The listing is exactly as pictured with tons of space and a beautiful kitchen. Wish we could’ve stayed longer!

Beautiful home. Clean, neat, and quiet. The host is very responsive and kind. Had a late flight, and the host allowed a late checkout, early check-in, as well if I needed. Very close to Purdue, which was the reason why we were there! The only thing was that there wasn't a TV in the main bedroom, other than that, it was great!!

We really enjoyed our stay here and absolutely loved how modern and comfortable that the space was!! It was a great getaway and in such a quiet location which we loved. Everything was very clean and Cathryn was very friendly!
We had an amazing time! Very beautiful house!
Cathryn was the friendliest and most responsive host I’ve ever booked through.
100% stay here!!! This is the perfect cottage to stay in if you are coming to see the Boilers play or visiting your favorite Boilermaker. Clean, well appointed, cozy, and exactly as described.
Perfect location and place to stay for Purdue graduation.

Definitely would recommend staying at this house. It was a great spot, very clean, nice amenities, good neighborhood. Close to everything you would need. The host was very friendly and even offered to bring any appliances from her own kitchen to the house if there was something we needed that wasn't already there!!
We LOVED our stay! It was such a relaxing and cozy place to stay during our long roadtrip across the country. Would come back for sure!
Cathryn’s home was exactly what we needed. Perfect for a little overnight/weekend get away.
This was a lovely place to stay! Very comfortable and welcoming. I would highly recommend! The host was very responsive and super helpful. We will definitely be staying there again!

This was by far the best Airbnb I've ever stayed at. Cathryn was a phenomenal host and took care of even the smallest details. My husband and I just moved across the country and this was the stopping point to rest overnight before hitting the road for a second day. We had our 3 pets in tow and knew we couldn't swing a hotel with our dog. Cathryn had everything we needed so we didn't have to unpack the vehicles to find our stuff - toothbrush/toothpaste, makeup remover, etc. The beds and linens were so comfortable. We truly could not have found a better place to rest for a few hours during one of the most stressful times of our lives!

Cathryn was an excellent host- super responsive and proactive from the initial booking through our stay. She gave us some local recommendations and also left plenty of goodies in the house for us. The house was adorable, clean and exactly as the pictures and description said. We would definitely stay here again!
Cozy and clean. Cathryn was a great host!

We were visiting Purdue and needed to bring our pups. This was a perfect spot, just 10 minutes away. The backyard isn't fenced but enclosed enough to keep my 2 dogs wrangled with plenty of room to romp. Beds were comfy. Nice amenities. Large kitchen.
Very quiet and a clean, comfortable space.

Cathryn is an amazing host! We had everything we needed for our stay, plus she had a lot of personal touches in the house that made us feel, cozy and well worth the great price that she offers for this property. Plus, the yard is huge for the area in town, and was very quiet and private.

Absolute beautiful place! We appreciated the responsiveness and simplicity that was provided by the host. The home is very neat, organized, spacious, and has a “home” feeling. It was the perfect place for the entire family. If you are traveling to the Lafayette, Indiana area, we can’t recommend this home enough! It was perfect for us in every way.

excellent location, tasteful decor, and top-notch amenities. Communication was prompt and helpful. Special appreciation for the host’s hospitality. Here has everything you need. Highly recommended her place. Feel like home.
Cathryn is a very friendly and responsive host. The house is very clean and tidy with a nice open layout. Will definitely book again!
Very good!

My friend and I had a great time staying here. We used it as a home base to hike and bird watch. Cathryn was attentive and even dropped off a corkscrew the first evening! If we come back to the area, we will definitely stay here again.

This was the best airbnb we have ever stayed in! Super nice neighborhood on a cul-de-sac that was easy to find. Cathryn was accomodating and kind. Lots of extras provided that made us feel well taken care of. The house is spacious and beautiful! Huge kitchen and rooms. The shower was fabulous. Everything was just right. She went out of her way to make our stay a wonderful one. Highly recommend this place!!
Couldn’t have stayed at a nicer place! Everything was perfect, we will for sure be back. Caitlyn was excellent too.

Cathryn was super responsive and gave us a flexible check in! The space was clean and tidy with a nice touch of Fall decor. Prices were inflated compared to other times of the year but understandable since it was a Purdue home game. We will be back!
This was the perfect home for our stay. Can’t say enough positive things-
Had a great stay - comfortable place! Very nice decor.

The place was awesome. Getting this much space, with the finishes, for this price is a great value! It was located near restaurants and grocery stores, which was very convenient. Yet, it was very secluded, making it very peaceful. If I ever have a long trip again, I’ll make sure to make a pit stop here!

I want to keep this place as my little secret hideaway! Catherine was a suburb host, and her house is so beautiful and relaxing. It is very clean and modern. Catherine answered any question I had and suggested great restaurants. My son was having some issues adjusting to college and just needed his grandma and mom to visit. We had the best time and was exactly what he/we needed. I can't say enough about this house...other than I will hate for others to find out about it and take up her available dates!

Cathryn was a gracious host. She let us check in early upon request which was really helpful.
We stayed here for 5nights. The place felt very calm and peaceful with all white decor and linen. Our stay was super comfortable.
She made sure we had everything we needed. We couldn't find a toaster in the kitchen, so just checked with her to ask were it was. She left a new toaster still in the box on the porch within an hour. Which was really impressive.
We had an issue with dry...but she made sure it got fixed during our stay. She was ready to offer laundry services for free till time the drier didn't work, but we thought of waiting for it to get fixed instead.
The back side patio is a beautiful place to sit and watch birds in morning and hangout with family in evening. But we couldn't do any of this as it was too hot during our stay. Maybe next time we visit.
We would definitely recommend and visit this place again.

We enjoyed our stay. Very comfortable.
Will be back. Thank you

Cathryn is a great host and the house was perfct! I appreciated all the little touches, snacks, nice personal care products, etc. Very easy to get to and just 10 minutes from Purdue. Thanks again for everything!
Stayed here for a week on a work trip. Felt a lot homier than a hotel! Thank you Cathryn.
The place is amazing with a lot of space

This is a bright and cheerful, well appointed 2 bedroom home, that oozes serenity and charm. The neutral decor is stylish and soothing , with pristine bathrooms and linens. This is an ideal home for a gathering with its open plan living area, well appointed kitchen and appliances and separate laundry. There are plenty of games and books available for guests to use. The outdoor surroundings are calm and very private and well furnished on both front and back patios. The location is central, being 3-4 miles to downtown Lafayette and the Purdue campus.
Our stay was comfortable and pleasant, well worth the value. Cathryn is a friendly and efficient hostess. We can highly recommend this cottage in Lafayette, Indiana.

Wow! What a beautiful place to stay! Jessica’s place is located in a wonderful, well-kept, peaceful neighborhood. The house was perfect for our group! Jessica responded quickly when I texted, and was very gracious. Definitely will come back!

The Highland Park Cottage had everything we needed and more, was so clean and cozy, and was in the perfect little neighborhood. We loved sitting on the front porch and taking a short walk around the neighborhood. Jessica was very communicative, kind, and overall a fantastic host. Absolutely would stay again!
Enjoyed our stay. Older home with some updates in very nice/historic neighborhood!
Cute little house on a cute street. Lots of space to spread out. Covered front porch swing was nice to relax on. Super close to downtown.
It was way better than even the pictures made it seem. Would definitely stay again if it’s available and I’m in the area

Came to town for my son’s graduation at Purdue University. This place is a home away from home in a very nice safe and friendly neighborhood.
One of the best Air Bnbs we’ve stayed at. She is an awesome host. Highly recommend and would definitely stay here again. Also took only 5 mins to get to the Purdue baseball field. Close to everything. Beds were comfy. We all slept great.

Great AirBnb in a nice neighborhood in Lafayette. House was well stocked with all the basics, was clean, and was well cared for. The bedroom downstairs had a king bed - the two bedrooms upstairs were small, with queen beds (and then a nice bathroom with tub between them). Owners were very responsive. We would definitely recommend if you are in town to visit Purdue.

We loved this place the minute we walked into it! Updated historical home with an amazing kitchen; large downstairs bathroom with huge walk-in shower; comfy beds; beautiful and original wooden floors; very nicely updated. What a treasure to find! Wonderful touches from the snacks in the kitchen to the extra towels bundled in the bathrooms. We were in town for a family gathering, and this allowed two families to stay in full comfort. Off street parking was nice, but the quiet neighborhood hardly had any traffic. Easy access from main streets and yet quiet setting in historical neighborhood.
Great place!
This home was exactly what we needed to accommodate all of our needs while we were away for a conference.

We love refurbished 1930s houses in the older, well maintained neighborhoods of Lafayette and this home is a perfect example of one. The house is bright and fresh and has all the things you need for an extended stay- a beautiful kitchen with new appliances, 1.5 bathrooms and a perfect sized laundry center. The house was clean and comfortable, nicely decorated and the location was perfect for driving to downtown as well as walking to the local park. Connor was timely in his responses and attentive to our requests. We would definitely stay in this home again.
Thank you! Enjoyed our stay.
Great house!
Very nice. Everything we needed was provided. Will use again!

Our stay was excellent. It was an extremely comfortable environment, with Connor always helping us when needed. Easy access to transportation (We went to Purdue University every day). I highly recommend the stay, and we intend to stay again when we return to Lafayette/West Lafayette.

Amazing place to stay!
So cute and comfortable.
Thank you Connor

Family gathering turned out to be an awesome stay thanks to Connor’s place. Close to the University but in a quiet area, his charming home made us feel like at home. We love the personal touches and all the amenities.
We will be back for sure! Thanks Connor.

Connor was a great host. Went out of his way to make us at home. Place was affordable and good fit for what we needed. Check in / out was super easy. Would recommend if you need a place to stay in Lafayette. You could tell Connor renovated and updated the place to make the stay more enjoyable.
Good, pleasant stay in a safe neighborhood.

The beds were so comfy and the kitchen was beautiful only thing I didn’t like was the floors were dirty so my kids ended up with their clothes being dirty from being on the floor and the dining room table was really wobbly. Great location and the back door was very convenient.
Great stay at Connor’s for a few days, very peaceful and relaxing.
Enjoyed our stay.
I stayed at this house with a few friends who were Purdue Alumni and it was a nice place to hang out. The place had a lot of nice amenities and I would definitely stay there again!

It was a wonderful stay, Connor was very helpful. The place was perfect for us and close to all of the wedding things we were in town for. I would highly recommend and when we come back that way I would definitely book it again.

Our family enjoyed the stay! Great place and located only a few blocks away from Columbia Park. Connor was an amazing host! Always responsive and helpful. We were sad to have to leave. It felt like home our entire stay!

One of the best host experiences that I've had so far. Conner was very helpful,responsive, and patient. The place is adorable! Very clean and easy to maintain. Quiet neighborhood and walking distance to one of the most beautiful parks in Lafayette!
Very nice house with everything I needed. Connor was a great host.
Newly remodeled and very will done. Very clean and we had everything needed. Close to the historical area downtown. Older area but quiet. Would stay there again.
Was perfect for our short term stay while we finished up work on a project near Perdue. Very close and convenient.

Great two bedroom close to the mall, but secluded enough to be off the beaten path. Host was very responsive and helpful, I would certainly recommend this place to others. Home was very clean, organized, and comfortable; it was a great place for a quiet weekend get away.
well-maintained seem like I might’ve been the first to ever rent the place it was that clean. Great updates very good communication with the host five stars!
ok
Good value! Place was clean and well described.
Good stay, close to all things West Lafayette. Worked well for our needs.

Jason had a roof issue with first Air BNB booking. He could of just put us in that Air BNB or just cancelled our reservation. Instead He moved our reservation across the street to a just remodeled place to make it hassle free for us, while they put a whole new roof on the place across the street. Stuff happens. It is how the host deals with it that matters. The sign of a great host is how they deal with problems should they arise.
Thanks, Jason

Jason was extremely accommodating. I had a few unexpected changes and he was there to make sure I was able to stay an extra night and have a late check out due to delayed flight.
The home is very spacious and has everything you need for a large family.
I would use him again if I’m in the area.
info and instructions easy to follow, good communication prior to check in, clean, well supplied, generally easy and convenient
Nice house. Good location. Comfy beds and big tv's in the bedrooms.
Great home, would book again!
Worked great for meeting up with family.
Jason’s hospitality was above and beyond. A spectacular host and human.
Exactly as described! Will stay again if we ever visit the area in the future.
Gracious host and amazing space! Wish we could have stayed longer.
Nice place. Very comfortable
Always a great host!!!
Great place! Very clean & we loved how every bedroom had a huge bed + huge TV
The place was a great stay and close to the university. Plenty of room and no one felt cramped.
This place was perfect for what we needed. I would definitely stay here again.
Always a great host

The house was great for our group. It was freezing (bad winter storm) and the heater worked great to keep us warm & cozy. Beds were comfortable, bathrooms were clean, living area was great, too! Jason was a good host & was flexible with our check in, as well. Would definitely stay there again! Thank you Jason!
The place was great, clean had everything we needed. Jason was a great guy to talk to and helped us every way he could. I would recommend this spot for anyone looking for a nice place to stay
Had a nice stay at this property. Location was ideal for easy and quick access to the Purdue campus. The house was clean and as described. There was plenty of space for everyone!
5 stars! Highly recommend
Thank you very much for every home. It's amazing. It's totally comfortable. Anyone would love to be back.

House was exactly how it was described. It is no frills, but perfect for larger crowd with everyone getting there own bedroom and plenty of bathrooms. All the amenities you'll need for a overnight or weekend trip.
Amazing stay! Very nice Area!
It was a great place to stay for my graduation from Purdue. Plenty of space for my family!
Enjoyed the area and house.
Great house and host Jason was very responsive to the issue I had
Claire's place is great! We stayed there briefly as we passed through the area, but check in and check out instructions were clear and we had everything we needed for a quick one night stay.
A peaceful place to stay. I would stay again. Thanks!

Claire was a great host. I was up very early the day I flew in and crashed early. There was tremendous effort put into being quiet while I was sleeping. They didn’t have to do that and went the extra mile to be quiet so I could get a good sleep.That was very kind😌

Absolutely the same as in the photo. Choose it, you won't be sad. Claire and her boyfriend are very good people. Home room, air bnb, wonderfully quiet, comfortable. Clean, decent house. Decent street, location. If we have to come again, it will be our first choice. Thanks a lot.

Easy to find and use street parking in this quiet street. Responsive host and answered every time I texted. She was home but I couldn't even hear her during the whole stay. Overall excellent host and nice private space to stay.
Not a lot of amenities. Clean and simple. A nice budget place!
We would stay again
Great location and price
My wife and I enjoyed our stay. Clean, easy directions, and very friendly.
I recommend staying at Claire’s place if you are in Lafayette. She provided affordable accommodations that were centrally located. With plenty of street parking in a quiet neighborhood.

Great stay at Claire's place. Easy to find, clean, and convenient. Although we only spoke very briefly, she was very respectful of our plans and very quiet. We didn't hear her or her boyfriend at all the whole time we were there. Not at all that night or in the next morning. Not even during the Perdue game during the Final Four! Much appreciated!
Claire’s place was perfect for us. We would definitely come back.
They are very nice and let me borrow utensils as well! The place is nice and relaxing!
cozy room, everything was clean. Hosts were super friendly and didn't disturb my rest. Really relaxing stay there
Claire was very communicative and her place was exactly as described. Will definitely stay again when I’m in the area!
This was a great place for a quick overnight stay. Quiet accommodations and clean bathroom with a hot shower.

Our stay with Claire was great! Her home is in a nice neighborhood, it was very clean, quiet and comfortable. Just what we needed after a long day on the road. The bathroom was very big and the shower was great. We would definitely stay again!
Great stay for a second time!
The room was everything advertised and very clean.

We appreciated the hospitality. The shared kitchen was nice. I was able to bring my own coffee maker, put our left overs in the fridge and use the microwave. Nice hot shower every time with our own bathroom to use off the hall. We had to go to bed pretty early everynight, and Claire and her husband were very quiet and courteous. Comfortable bed and a little desk to use for work, or make up area.
good place to stay
Exactly as described. It had everything I needed. Thanks!
Everything is great in the room, it does not have a TV. Small but very comfortable room.
Responds quickly, and space is well kept. Highly recommend!
Beautiful house and peaceful neighborhood, I would book again if I am ever in Lafayette.
Nice home to stay.
Claire's place was as advertised. Clean room, clean bathroom. Easy in and out.
wonderful stay would do it again!
Great neighborhood and close to everything. Easy check in process!
We enjoyed it so much we rebooked. its in a very nice neighborhood, Claire space is very welcoming and close to all ones needs.
Claire’s place was just as described. Only stayed one night but felt right at home.
Good 👍🏽
Very neat and clean.
Simple but comfortable accommodation. The host was kind and responsive. It is easy to find, and the check-in/out instructions are easy.
Clean and quiet.
Second time staying here. Place is exactly what I needed to have restful sleep and freshen up every day. Space is clean. Will be back another time soon.
This is my second time staying at Claire’s relax place and it’s one of my favorites it’s quite and comfortable
Clean, quiet, and comfortable.
Good place to stay for my brief visit. Bring shampoo and soap for the shower
Claire place matches the description a very relaxed room she’s got very good relations with her customers response as quickly as possible her place is really a room for relaxation
Great place to stay.

Clair was very helpful and flexible with setting up the accommodation. She was very flexible and accommodated a last minute change I had to make. The place was as described easy to find and very clean. I would stay here again.
Excellent place to stay!
Stay was fine. Clean bed, sheets and bath. Responsive host. Recommend this place!
Right place for me. Place was accurately described. Quiet neighborhood. Comfortable bed. Clean bathroom. Plan to stay here again soon.
Claire’s place was a great, peaceful place for a night! The bed was very comfortable, and she very quickly addressed the one minor question I had.
Everything was great!
Great find. Clean home. Beautiful couple. Would definitely stay again.
I thought our stay at Claire’s was fine .nothing fancy.I would stay again if in the area.
Just a nice little room in a good location that was very affordable. It was a great stay!
Good place for a quick recharge
Morning breakfast & coffee or tea should be provided. Towels & toiletries could have been better.overall experience is good.
Nice stay!
Quick stay in Lafayette. Claire's place hit all the checkmarks. Clean, comfortable, safe, and price.
Great and comfortable stay!
Great space, great location and great host! We were only there for a brief stop on our way through, but it was just what we needed! Would definitely stay again.
I had a wonderful experience renting a private room from AirBnB. My host was attentive, responsive, and truly went out of her way to make her guests feel at home.
Wonderful hosts and a great spot to stay for the price. Would definitely recommend.
Easy in, easy out, great location, comfortable accommodations. Would stay again.
A very nice place to spend the night. Conveniently located and east to get to. Claire was helpful and friendly. Would stay again!
A great place to stay for traveling through Lafayette.
Comfortable place, clean, Claire was super sweet! Great location for me!
Smooth as always! Clare is a great host and always responds fast!

I had a wonderful stay at Claire's and would highly recommend it to others! The place is extremely clean and cozy and offers a nice gateway. It has all the amenities you would need and Claire is very friendly and responds to any needs you may have. I would stay here again if I'm passing through Lafayette.
The location is close to restaurants, shopping, and IU Arnett hospital. The neighborhood is very quiet. Plenty of street parking. The area felt safe. Claire and Ben are excellent hosts.
Matched the photos perfectly and Claire was quick to respond! Great value.
Awesome hosts, great location near hospital, quiet neighborhood, comfortable accommodations, plenty of street parking. Thanks so much Claire and Ben.
Clean, quiet, comfortable. Thumbs up!
We like the place a lot!
Smooth as usual! Great communication, everything set up and clean for us! Very good value for its price and location. Will be back again
Great place to stay
Had to take a Prometric test. Claires Airbnb was tidy and quiet, and 5 minute drive for the test center. Highly recommend staying here!
Great place for a short stay!
Clean, cozy, and responsive host! Would definitely stay here again. Parking was super easy.
Claire hosted us very nicely. Everything was well organised. We enjoyed our stay a lot🙂.
Nice and cozy.. great host ❤️
Briefly stayed for the night for an exam, but very clean and comfortable.
Great place to stay!

Definitely a great stay and for its price, amazing value!
Everything was clean and exactly as pictured! Claire is great at communication and check-in/out was smooth!
Would recommend this stay to anyone in need of a room to visit Purdue, stop for rest, etc!
10/10
It's a great place to live. We stayed there for two weeks and it was a great experience.

It was a short stay and accommodated the needs for our urgent visit to Indiana.
Thanks Burt
Enjoyed our stay at Burt’s place. It’s clean and easy to find. The host was great with communication and proactive with his tips. It’s quiet and serene! Thank you!!

I booked this place based on previous reviews and from the description listed - it sounded like a great place to stay. I am not a high maintenance individual but I expect basic cleanliness and function. The water ran brown at first. Had to run all facets for a good 15 minutes before the water would run clean. There was a towel that looked to have had old blood stains on it. The exhaust fan was caked with dust. The shower was leaking into the basement. The paint was peeling on the bathroom ceiling and on the bedroom door. Every door handle was loose. The bathroom door doesn’t close all the way. There is a smoke smell from the duplex neighbor smoking and sharing walls. The vents had dust, dirt and previous crumbs of food from past stays. I contacted the owner and made him aware. We canceled our stay and left early. I hope he takes my concerns and fixes the problems for future visitors. I will say, check in was easy enough and previous to staying, Burt communicated just fine.

Comfortable quiet place in eastern Lafayette. Appreciated the personal touches like the welcome sign, some small toiletries in case you forgot something, and some welcome amenities that made us feel welcome.
Easy to recommend if you are in western Indiana!

A cozy and convenient place in a quiet neighborhood. We needed a place to crash for the night after arriving late and this was great. Got a restful night's sleep and were ready to head out to explore Purdue in the morning. Appreciated the personalized welcome message from Burt!
Beautiful home
It was a great stay

Wonderful place.
Will visit again.
Perfect.
This place was 100% accurate...cute remodeled older home. Peaceful neighborhood and super clean!

This was our second time staying at Burt's. We really like how cozy this place is and that we have everything we need to cook. Also, the beds were really comfortable. We'll definitely stay here again!
Fantastic place to stay. Very nice area. Would definitely stay there again

Burt’s place was a perfect little get away. I’m a student at Purdue who was looking to escape campus for a bit. The house was extremely comfortable and clean especially for the price. I will definitely be recommending it to friends and family members who may visit me as well as look forward to staying in the future!

Burt was communicative and friendly. His place matched the description exactly and it was clean and cozy. We would definitely stay at Burt’s place again should we find outback in Lafayette. Great value and a great place.
great place I would stay again
Great Place Great Location!! Very clean
Very nice, clean house perfect for our needs. Thank you.

I visited Purdue University with my family, and we enjoyed our stay at Burt's place. It was easy to check in, and we had everything we needed in the apartment. Super quiet neighborhood, so if you want to rest and relax, this is the place. Definitely would book again.
clean and nice. highly recommended
Nice area. Clean and easy.

Listening to music on the Bose radio & looking out the kitchen window at the brick house with flower garden & birdbath next door, I noticed a path between the houses, followed it & found a fawn looking up at me. A neighborhood of looping, quiet, tree-lined streets. We much enjoyed the sunporch, & also the shady front porch. Weather was in the 90s, but the house was perfectly cool. An oasis. An easy walk to downtown, or a few minutes drive from Purdue or anywhere else around Lafayette. Nicole was super-responsive. Every aspect of this house is A+++.

This home is in a world apart, but close to everything that you would go to Lafayette for. The living space was light and airy, and the home is very well equipped. I'll look for this place on any future trips to Lafayette.

So well and thoughtfully stocked that one almost feels like it's one's own home. Very clean, beautiful spaces throughout, including a great sunroom and front porch. Located in a quiet and lovely neighborhood. Highly recommended!

The house is very spacious, clean, easy to find. And Nicole basically has everything prepared already, especially the cookware:) And she is always easy to reach out when we need help. Highly recommend!
Nicole’s house is amazing. Everything we need can be found easily. Clean and quite. Only five minutes drive to Purdue. Our family had two wonderful day!
Extremely clean and comfortable. The neighborhood is beautiful, quiet, and safe. Highly recommend :)

Nicole and Doug’s place is in a historic area close to downtown and not too far from Purdue . We gave them short notice and they were very accommodating. I was totally stoked when we pulled up and saw the adorable glassed in sitting area out back with a view of a gorgeous wooded lot alongside a historic walking bridge . The house is whistle clean with upscale touches like Ralph Lauren sheets , beautiful soaps , Keurig coffee, and Bose speakers that sound amazing . Almost every Neighbor is out walking a dog or “porch sitting “. Doug was kind enough to bring me his dogs Greta and Frieda for the day and we joined in the fun with amazing walks throughout the vintage homes . LOVED it !
It was awesome. House is pretty and hosts are very friendly. We arrived late about 1 hour. The host still waited for us and showed us around the house. 5 star!

We stayed one week, and loved our stay! Everything is clean and well organized, and Nicole and Doug were very welcoming and easy to deal with. It's a great neighorhood, and we hope to stay there again some time. Thanks Nicole and Doug!

The place looked exactly like the photos. The home was clean and the beds were comfortable. Internet speed and connectivity was good. Limited cable options, but you can easily stream videos if you have Netflix. The kitchen was stocked appropriately with plates, dishes, etc. The bathroom is beautiful and the shower/water has good pressure and temperature. Nicole was very friendly and offered to be available if we had any needs. We didn’t use the sunroom much since it was colder outside, but I imagine it is a great place to relax when it is a bit warmer outside. Overall, a beautiful home!
Everything was great!

A quiet and historic neighborhood, and a beautiful, spacious house. It was icy when we arrived and Nicole had shoveled and put down salt in the driveway. The house had all the amenities we wanted and had a really cozy back room that we loved spending our evenings in. The beds were super comfy and the shower was great -- two very important features when you're away from home!
Nicole was a great host! She responded quickly to my messages and her house was in perfect condition! Would definitely recommend staying here!

Nicole and Doug were great hosts! They were very responsive and provided lots of great information on the area. The house was adorable (we loved spending time in the screened in patio) and is located in a charming neighborhood. Highly recommend and will definitely look to stay here the next time I am in Lafayette.

Nicole's house was very stylish and sparkling clean! It had a lot of kitchen supplies for us to use during our stay as well as drinks (such as coffee, tea, soda, water, etc) and other condiments to go with any meal we might have wanted to make. It was definitely worth the price, and we will be staying in her home if it's available next time we visit!

Nicole is a fantastic host. Thanks to a nice winter storm, our arrival was delayed, but Nicole had clear and easy checkin instructions for us. And a shoveled driveway to boot (thoughtful touch)! The house itself was beautiful with lovely pine floors and an immaculate bathroom. We walked into a warm home with cookies, a nice tip about a local cafe, and an eclectic mix of coffee table books. Great touches that really enhanced an already comfy experience. Not sure when we’ll be in Lafayette next, but will hope that this place is available again then!
Great lodging and very reasonable price! The house was clean and very comfortable. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Thank you!

I recently stayed at the Downtown Abbey and had an exceptional experience! This stylish home, located in the heart of Lafayette, IN, provided the perfect blend of modern amenities and urban charm. The host, Dennis, was incredibly accommodating, ensuring a seamless check-in process and an amazing location.
Being downtown meant we were within walking distance of numerous restaurants, cafes, and shops. The vibrant nightlife and cultural attractions, including theaters and art galleries, were just steps away, making it easy to immerse ourselves in the local scene.
The convenience of having on-site parking was a huge plus, and the Wi-Fi was fast and reliable, which was essential for both work and leisure. Dennis provided thoughtful touches like complimentary snacks and beverages.
Overall, our stay at the Downtown Abbey was fantastic. The combination of a great location, stylish and comfortable accommodations, and excellent host hospitality made for a memorable visit. Highly recommend!

We were looking for a place to stay within walking distance of downtown Lafayette, to take full advantage of great restaurants and the farmers' market. Downtown Abbey was just this! It is about a 6 minute walk from downtown, located in a quiet historic neighborhood with some amazing architecture, and the space itself was outfitted with everything we needed. The hosts have really put a lot of thought into creating a space for a diversity of travelers. The kitchen especially was well stocked and organized. The hosts were VERY responsive through the messaging option. We would definitely stay in this home again!

Meticulously kept home. Great location near downtown Lafayette and less than a $5 Uber ride from Purdue campus and downtown West Lafayette. Parking was convenient. Great place to stay. We will be back!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Quiet neighborhood. Parking in back was a bonus. Spacious bedrooms with comfortable beds. Stairs are indeed steep but our grandmas managed them ok with the help of the railing. Large, clean kitchen with 2 types of coffee machines and snacks. While there was not a living room, we were able to use the indoor/outdoor table and chairs to sit outside and enjoy the peaceful, beautiful garden in the morning and late afternoon.

We loved the house, and really appreciated the cleanness and the charm. It is an old house beautifully renovated. You get the feeling but not the rust. Soon after arrival it felt like home.
The rooms are big and the beds are comfortable. Everything was clean, the appliances are working well.
It is carefully furnished, with just the perfect amount of matching furniture to make the atmosphere perfect. We enjoyed the strange shapes that comes from the floor plan, all the small details and ideas. The bathroom was just enough high for us. The kitchen is downstairs and the bathroom is upstairs, but it is ok.
The trees around the house are beautiful and it has a nice garden too, almost feels like living in a park. The neighborhood felt safe and we wished had more time to walk and explore.
We got very clear instructions, there are even tags on the cupboards. Check in and out was easy and fast. We got fast and nice answers.
If we can, we definitely will come back! Thank you!

It is a lovingly furnished house where every corner was well used. For me with a height of 1.65 m, everything was relaxed - taller people probably have to duck in front of the bathroom sink. The residential area is quiet and quiet I walk about 30 minutes from here to Purdue University every morning. There are also free connector buses from downtown, then you're a little faster. If you come with a roller suitcase, it should be a bit more robust (I preferred to lift my old roller suitcase a bit), because the street or sidewalk to the house is bumpy in places. Of course, this is not Dennis' fault - it's just a tip for future guests.
If someone comes with children, they will surely love the muggy spaces. However, children should be old and responsible enough not to spill liquids on the wood.
The communication was great, and the price was great too!

The house is nicely kept and was clean. I was surprised there was no living room area(but to be fair it is the last line in the listing that I missed) but I do feel it should be highlighted better, there is no tv, and just a cafe table and chairs in the kitchen for dining, it's otherwise just kitchen and bedrooms. Other item that was a bit unfortunate is that the windows were not operational for opening, and it got very hot and humid during our visit, we did not see a thermostat to turn on central air, and also no ceiling fans, or stand alone fans.. it got very stuffy in the house and was hard to sleep. Also, the parking in back is off an alleyway that was extremely narrow and the branches scraped down both sides of my vehicle.
It's a nice place to stay if you will be spending all your time out and about.

This place is very close to the downtown area and a short drive from the University of Purdue. Despite the proximity to the downtown, the area is very quiet and private. The check-in in process was straight forward with clear instructions. In fact there is also a private, little parking area for the Airbnb guests. The home is a cute and quaint space. I enjoyed the kitchen space as there were pots and pans for cooking, seasonings, and available breakfast snacks. The space is clean overall, although I did notice some of the pillow throws had mild stains on them. Be careful if you are taller since there are low-rise ceilings and overhangs in corner spaces. It would be helpful to have rugs along the stairs since I found myself almost slipping couple of times.
Great place for spend few days, over all if you come with family, very easy parking and very close to main amenities and restaurants in town.

This is a great spot to stay when visiting a Purdue student or just exploring Lafayette! A cozy space with the perfect weekend amenities and the vintage charm of an older home while remaining immaculately clean!
The place is comfortable and Dennis was very responsive. As a woman staying alone I didn’t always feel 100% safe. Some of the neighboring houses, including the one next door, were a bit iffy.
Very quiet neighborhood. Close to Purdue University. Crystal clear instructions.
it's a single house converted into two BNB's so there are a few locked doors (like the basement) that make you feel like you're being watched.. but overall a nice home base.
Great deal. Dennis was super communicative and flexible with our late check in. Would stay here again.

Our stay was very pleasant. Great location near Purdue University/downtown. Place was well kept and spotless with nice amenities. Interactions with Dennis and Theresa were very pleasant. We lost a set of keys and they had the cleaning crew thoroughly look through the house. It was nice of them to do so!
Lovely place

Been staying here for years. It’s close, convenient and provides a good value.
We will be back next year I’m sure.

I booked this location several months in advance to attend the final game of the Purdue University Men's Basketball season. At the time I booked there were not many options offered yet for this date (likely too early?) so I really appreciated Dennis's listing and the ability to confirm my plans.
I appreciated the photos and thorough description of the unit (especially about low head space over the bathroom sink since my two traveling companions are over 6 ft tall). During our stay, I appreciated the accurate directions, ease of entry and exit, snacks waiting for us, walkability to evening restaurant options, cleanliness of the entire unit, comfort of bedding, etc.
I did have a challenge with noise coming from the other half of the unit very late at night, and very much appreciated Dennis's concern and prompt reply as soon as he saw my message. One thing to take note of was that there is no TV - this was not a concern for us but might be for others.
I would book there again! :)
This was a nice, quiet place to stay. All very clean and proper. Thanks!
Very communicative and willing to give suggestions for all our needs!
We appreciated Dennis' helpful responses, the unique and delightful apartment, and the very reasonable rate. We will return !
Dennis was a great host, super responsive!

Perfect place to stay for a Purdue visit. Two miles from campus, easy parking. Clean, comfortable, and the most stocked Airbnb I’ve stayed in (the kitchen drawers were labeled!) Two comfortable bedrooms, nice hot shower, super cute remodeled older home. Would definitely return.
Dennis was very communicative upon check in and check out - perfect stay for our quick visit to Purdue!
Great place to stay, would definitely stay there again!
Just the space I needed to prepare a few meals and a comfortable nights rest while attending a conference.
Had stayed here several times and always know what to expect. The place feels so comfortable so easy to settle in and relax.

Elderly folks might avoid this home due to the steep staircase.
Otherwise the place was excellent. I slept well, felt safe, the parking situation is good, and I had an overall positive experience. Will be back if I find myself in Lafayette again.
We loved staying in this fun, quaint, quirky house! My 6'2" partner had to crouch in a few spots which was very amusing but added to the charm! Lovely place!

I was amazed on how spacious this location was but it matched the description. I was very thankful for the prompt response from Dennis & the reassurance I needed to make my stay at ease. Thank you for this.

Clean with nice spacious rooms. WiFi worked great. Check in was easy and well described with pictures. Can’t speak much on the neighborhood because it was freezing temps outside and it was dark when I came and went but it seemed very safe and nice. Coworkers from the area told me it was a safe area. Thanks Dennis!!
Very nice accommodations as always

Everything was amazing, we haven’t been to more stock air bnb, the board games were a nice touch. The room temperature was good, easily controllable and the bathroom was cozy and clean, you just want to go take a shower. The kitchen as I said was fully stocked and furnished, ready for cooking.

This AirBnB is exactly what we needed. Good location close to Purdue's campus and easy to communicate with the owner for logistics. I've stayed at this AirBnB before and sought it out again for this visit to Purdue from a previous good experience.
great host, watch out for angled walls!

Nice, quiet little place.
Perfect for a swim meet weekend at Purdue. Had all the basics we needed. Thanks.
Nice place overall!
Great stay. Would come back for sure.

Dennis’s place is always what it says. Third time we have booked this unit and fourth time we booked with Dennis - you can never go wrong! Wonderful people who provide a great experience each and ever time.

Great location and good directions for getting there and inside. We didn’t spend much time at the house but it was a peaceful location. The house had everything we needed and some really cute aspects like the hobbit reading nook. There wasn’t an actual living room, but we didn’t need it. Kitchen was very nice although we didn’t use it.
Great stay!!

Dennis' place was great! Super clean, comfortable and quiet - so it was very relaxing. Dennis was very responsive and helpful. There is lots of space, and everything you need is provided. Thank you for a great stay!
Wonderful place to stay in a restored old house. Everything was clean and functional. Loved the unique shape of the rooms upstairs in the cape. Walking distance to downtown.
Dennis place was very clean, We enjoyed our stay. The weather was cool outside, and the bedrooms were alittle cooler then I expected. all said it was a nice place to stay.

Quirky bathroom with angled ceilings, super comfortable beds, large separate bedrooms, plenty of pillows, pristine kitchen with snacks and coffee maker.
Close to the very eclectic town shops and restaurants.
Be sure to check out Sweet Revolution Bake Shop.
Just what I needed and was looking for
Simple and straightforward with a touch of charm.

Dennis’ place was a great place to stay. Convenient to everything. Easy to get to. Perfect directions on accessing the unit with pictures. The house was very clean. It is an old, historic restored house with lots of charm. We will definitely try to stay here again. He was so helpful to us in a time of need to be with our Purdue student after a surgery that couldn’t stay in the dorm for 2 weeks. Top notch!
Great place for money

Great, clean, place. Make sure you go around back to get inside. I got in late and tried the front door where the address took me and it didn't work. Thankfully they responded quickly even though it was nearly midnight. Also felt like it was in a nice, safe, area.

Beautiful home very close to Purdue and downtown Lafayette. Fully stocked kitchen and has all amenities needed for short or long stay, individual or group stay. Comfy beds and good internet (for those planning remote work from here). The outside look / photo views do not do justice to the inside. I was very surprised (pleasantly) at the interiors. Being a DIY guy myself, can see and feel the attention to detail the host has given to make this house so well done. Three Cheers to Dennis and co-hosts!!! One (hopefully) helpful note for people with mobility issues : All bedrooms are upstairs; so people with mobility issues may find the stairs difficult to navigate.
Great place to relax- nice renovation and very good Wi-if. Beds where comfortable and clean! Bathroom has low ceiling and no real room to get together. It was a relaxing place to stay!
Thank you Dennis for your hospitality. it was a great weekend, and the Buckeyes put a whoopin’ on Purdue…..GO BUCKS!!

A great little historic home! Everything was clean and ready. I loved the architecture and victorian feel of the building itself too! It was super nice having a full kitchen and washer-dryer combo as well. Highly recommend if you are going to Lafayette!
Great place to stay in Lafayette. Close to Purdue. We will definitely stay here again.
Great place to sray--I alwys try to book when I come to town for work
Dennis was wonderful to work with! A very nice place to stay. Very clean and comfortable. Directions on how to enter the place were very helpful and ease of use! Thanks again!
Great location! Great communication! Highly recommend!
This was a great place to stay. Everything was clean, and there were clear instructions to get checked in.
Cute and cozy space. Pretty quiet and close to Purdue. Parking in rear was convenient. Beds were quite comfy. Watch your head upstairs if you're 6' or taller
Great value, plenty of parking and walkable to downtown Lafayette. Will be back!
This place is amazing. We have stayed here before and trust me we will stay here again! It is beautiful and always clean. Dennis as a host is top-notch!
great location. Perfect for visiting Purdue!
Great place to stay and had what I needed for my stay.
Excellent property. Nice history too. Well placed appliances, furniture. can sleep 5 people. Close to Purdue and Lafayette downtown.
Great amenities and location!

Pictures don't do justice for this property. You have to be there to experience it. The owners have taken great effort in restoring this home that it felt like going back in time. The large old gas stove, the Large Porcelain Sink, the narrow dark stairs, the decors and its alleyway access to the rear.. all add to its uniqueness.
This is a great getaway place and something worth enjoying for individuals and family with lil kids who would love the layout. yes, there is stairs and all Bedrooms and bath is upstairs. Only Kitchen, Dining and Laundry on the main floor. Stayed here for a few days and it was worth every penny. Beats staying in hotel and such. Experience the beautiful Lafayette downtown.
This is the second location from this host I was staying at. I would confidently rent any others properties from this host including new ones that are coming up across the street.
Had a brilliant stay!

Very cozy, quaint home. I was pleasantly surprised by the interior architecture, perfect lighting and furnishings. Everything was very clean, comfortable and the area felt safe. The restroom had everything that one needs for a nice hot shower. I think the restroom was my favorite room of all the rooms. I recommend this place if you’re gonna be in town. The host Dennis was easy to get a hold of and he was very helpful. I am looking forward to returning for another visit when the time comes.
This is my second stay in this unit. It is a great Airbnb. It feels very safe and comfortable. Dennis is a super host and very friendly! I will come back again, definitely.
Wonderful stay - amazing hosts! Great place to stay ❤️

We love old houses with character! They've done a great job updating with a beautiful bathroom and great sleeping space. The kitchen is large and has eating space with a dining table for 4. We also had family games there 🙂
The alley to park in isn't super easy to find, but the pictures they've provided make it so easy to know you're in the right place!
A good option

Great place to stay! well worth money! and walking distance to Downtown! very quiet neighborhood
Very nice place to stay quiet neighborhood
I have stayed here several times, book anytime I’m in the area and it’s available.

Aside from being a really cool and delightful place, it is definitely worth scanning the QR code in the kitchen to see how much work by how many people went into turning the home into what it is. Congratulations to the whole crew!
Nice accommodations and convenient location

The house has lots of space and is super clean. Situated in a quiet residential neighborhood. We loved our space and the hosts' thoughtful preparations for their guests. Very convenient for a visit to Purdue University.

Our stay at Downtown Abbey was just lovely. It was very quiet and very clean. The location was perfect for us. My son lives in West Lafayette so getting to them was easy. Also I enjoyed so much just walking around the neighborhood; there are so many beautiful old homes. Some are in bad shape, but I still appreciate their history. I walked from our little home to downtown and all the way over to West Lafayette. I would gladly stay here again. Next time perhaps my sister will stay in the front part of the house then we could just open the adjoining doors and visit with each other. Having a little sitting area in our unit would be welcomed, but we made due with sitting in the kitchen. The upstairs front bedroom would make a nice sitting area, but we didn't use it that way since we were respectful of not having food upstairs. Thank you for offering your sweet cottage on airbnb!
it was great
Wonderful experience, the house is cozy and well equipped, Dennis is a very kind and proactive host.

We highly recommend this lovely home! Dennis was super easy to communicate with, and very helpful. The house was perfect for us - comfortable, clean, and private. We were able to walk to Main St and across the river to Purdue. It was so nice of our hosts to leave snacks and coffee pods for us! We loved our stay and will do so again if we return to the area.
Great place and super clean!!! Everything we needed and more!
Great place to stay.
Great place would stay again

My stay was great i had no problems and they allowed me to get a late check out with no problems. The place is very clean and has everything that u might need during ur stay. The bed and pillows were very comfy. I will definitely stay again.

Stayed here while was umpiring baseball at Purdue. Made me feel right at home. The only thing missing was a living room area but I personally didnt need that. Loved the old stove and the history of the house. Also loved the ability to park in the back of the house. Very clean and the bed was comfortable. Would stay there again if I go back.
Good value. Served as a nice stop while making an overnight stay for business in the Lafayette area.
Very clean and close to Purdue and downtown Lafayette.

Nice home in quiet neighborhood.
Would stay there again!
Great location.

Our suite was clean and offered exactly what we needed for our family of five. Check-in and out was incredibly simple; parking was convenient; and the place was very clean. It was a perfect home base to rest while we were in town.
Dennis was very helpful and kind host. Would stay again when in town!
A wonderful space close to the university in a safe and quiet neighborhood!
Glad this house was saved from demolition by the owners! Nice location very close driving distance to Purdue. Comfortable. Hosts were very responsive

We came to Lafayette to visit Purdue University and this place provided a great stay in a great location! Very close to the university and also to downtown. House was very clean and quaint with lots of amenities. Overall, amazing stay and would come back.

Perfect location , accessible to Lafayette AND Purdue university, where we were visiting. Although there wasn’t a t.v., we enjoy board games and Yahtzee happened to be in the closet. Bonus!! We chose to play upstairs because it is very cozy and inviting. The kitchen was clean and a good spot to eat on the go. I loved the charm of the home, cubbies, little doors and special touches you only find in older homes. We had a terrific experience in a peaceful neighborhood. Thank you.
This was the perfect place for a quick stay in Lafayette!
This was a nice place to stay, very clean and well maintained. great place for the price. Old world neighborhood charm.

Lovely place… charming, clean, well equipped. Large rooms. The only drawback was that my husband and I are Sr. Citizens and we found the stairway difficult. It was steep and had turns. We were ask not to wear shoes inside and I have balance issues and found stairs hard to negotiate. The location was great … we were taking our granddaughter to Purdue (we are alumni) for orientation …easy to get back and fourth from campus.
We feel the stairs were our problem we just need to be more cautious at our age.
A downtown gem. A historic home that has been upgraded very thoughtfully. Very convenient with everything exactly as described. Stairs were very manageable.
This is a lovely, large space in a quiet neighborhood. I found it ideal in terms of visiting the nearby campus -- not very far, but not too close! I hope to return again.
Dennis communicated quickly, honestly, and kindly.
The place was great and definitely somewhere I would stay again.

The host is very kind and responsive. The unit is spacious and clean. The pricing is good with the very good quality. The host provides a lot of extras. I love the kitchen and everything provided in the kitchen! We have an excellent stay! The house and the area is very quiet.
I love the Downton Abbey!! It was my 3rd stay there … it is always clean and comfortable.
We had a great stay! Well organized and had everything we could possibly need. The house was extremely clean and the neighborhood was quiet. Definitely recommend!
Great location, great communication, and great visit!
Stunning and spotless with thoughtful touches and tasteful design. Your every need has been carefully anticipated and provided for. So much vintage charm with modern conveniences. We will be back!
The host is very responsive and communicative. The place is clean and the kitchen is well stocked. We appreciate the free welcome snack and coffee in the morning.
Great location if you’re staying at Purdue and have a vehicle but want something better than some of the hotel / motel options.
Good place, very clean. Easy check in.
Simple: just stay here.

Great place to stay for a great price. It was clean and well furnished for our needs. Dennis was incredibly accommodating as some unpredictable family circumstances changed our arrival and departure dates a couple of times. High responsiveness and customer service mindset. We would book and stay there again in a heartbeat!
Lovely home, we will stay again next time we are in town. :)
Great location in central Lafayette. The rooms are spacious and have loads of character
I love the downton abbey … it’s a great, unique stay! Pretty close to campus ! Very clean !

This is a solid stay for the Lafayette area! Within walking distance to restaurants. This is not at all a complaint, but just a little warning depending on the purpose of your trip! The kitchen is the only area on the first floor, and it is quite spacious. The bedrooms are all upstairs which is something to not for those with mobility concerns. There are no common areas outside of the kitchen (I.e, a living room), but there was plenty of space to spread out in the kitchen and the bedroom floors. Overall I would recommend, but I wanted to make others aware of this just in case you need a more distinct living room space to hang out!!
The owner labeled everything in the kitchen and had snacks and coffee!
Great location and clean place. Has everything you need. Wished there had been a television but maybe next time. It was an easy stay.
Place was great, clean, and check-in was easy.

Home was just as described ! My son is 6’5 and was amused

Fantastic place to stay during my business trip to Lafayette!
Solid place to stay. Good location, not ideal if spending a lot of time in the house. As most of the rooms arent large.
Highly recommended! We enjoyed our stay. The house is as advertised. Dennis was very responsive, thanks Dennis!
Very lovely and quiet stay. Clean and kept up property. Mr. Dennis was quick to reply with answers to questions we had. I would recommend this place to anyone needing a place to stay.
Charming home with an interesting history. Wonderful location. The hosts had everything clearly marked and communicated, so it made for a care-free stay.
Great place to stay! Absolutely gorgeous.
Great place if you’re trying to stay close to downtown and remain in proximity to Purdue campus.
I stopped back through Lafayette on my return trip and stayed here a second time. It was the perfect little retreat on the way back home.
A neat place with history and interesting characteristics.
Very expensive! Beautiful historic house right in the heart of Lafayette!
A very clean, quaint, and functional space. Having a full kitchen and laundry was key for me. I'd happily return on my way back through Lafayette.
Second stay here. Great space. Clean, well managed home with plenty of charm and good amenities. Fun neighborhood. Will be back.

The house is great. The bedrooms are spacious and the house was very clean. Check in was easy as well. My only caution would be that if you are tall (above 6'3" or so), you might need to watch your head on the stairs and in the bathroom.
We would definitely stay here again.

Love this house! Be sure to learn about its history and remodeling. Perfect place for 2, but be aware that it does not include any public area (den or dining) except for a 2’ table on a wall in the kitchen. Be sure to park in the back for very easy access to your half of the house.
A wonderful place to stay--I stay here quite often-- close to downtown and easy walk.
This was a very nice, very clean place to stay for our weekend in Lafayette! I would definitely stay again.
Beautiful and charming house in a quiet neighborhood. The bedroom was comfortable. There are many beds and futons to relax. The kitchen is well equipped and the bathroom is clean and nice.

Excellent Air bnb, super clean, very expertly labeled kitchen. The instructions to enter were very easy to follow. The GPS will take you to the front, but the back lot has a different way to get in, but there was so much street parking we didn't bother to figure it out. Very responsive host who is very nice as well! If you are visiting and want to go to out I highly recommend "The Tap" across the bridge in West Lafayette. It has a wonderfully long beer selection as the name implies and the food was very good as well. A good place to go watch any sports while you are staying here!
100% recommended, it is a private and very equipped place, it also has 3 beds, totally amazing

Charming, clean and neat place! Highly recommend.

The house and location were safe, it wasn’t the closest walk to downtown so we drove but we were totally fine with that, you could definitely walk if you wanted to though. The area recommendations were spot on, we checked out the ax throwing place and had a really fun time!
Comfortable place with nice hosts. The location was not ideal and a little unsafe for our liking, but it was a 6 minute ride to West Lafayette.
clean. quiet. nice stay.

second stay...always pleasant. Great location for visiting my son at Purdue.
The room is very clean, the kitchen is very practical, the only regret is that the shower head cannot be adjusted, I hope to improve it, I will stay again if I have the opportunity.

Very neat older home! For those who are over 6', the bathroom sink will require you to tilt or duck a bit. Also, the bathroom is only upstairs where the bedrooms are for those who may have mobility issues.

This is a cool old house that's been nicely refurbished. Just a couple minutes from downtown. The only warning I have is that you'll need to climb some fairly narrow stairs to get to the bedrooms, so if you have problems with that you might take heed.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay! The apartment is lovely. Dennis put a lot of care into restoring an historic home in a cool neighborhood. The house is just a short walk from all that Downtown has to offer. I look forward to returning!
Well maintained. Easy access.

Dennis is Amazing and very accomodating! After i arrived I quickly realized the area wasnt the safest. But if you are a true crime fan, you are about 3 houses down from the famous Marcia Heald home of Murder!! So that was awesome!! Overall I would stay again but make sure you read all amenities the no TV sucked.
I stayed here when visiting my daughter at Purdue. The place is charming and very comfortable and deep value for money. Dennis is a wonderful host.
Nice stay! I had trouble finding the alleyway because it’s a little bit hidden, but check-in instructions are very clear. Clean and the host was very kind.
Very nice and clean place. Good location.
Clean, cozy, and comfortable. Dennis was responsive and helpful in all communication. Excellent proximity to Purdue.
Outstanding visit! Great accommodations and communications with location very central to downtown Lafayette and Purdue. Will re-visit for sure.
Great property. Very clean. Great communication with host. All was well!
Really great well appointed space. Decorations were fun and inviting. Would love to stay here again!
Great place to stay!
Booked last minute and it worked out great! Really clear instructions for check in, and a nice comfortable place!
Had an excellent stay. Very clean, easy communication, good amenities. Lovely place.
Host was professional and accommodation was exactly as expected. would stay again!
As described, easy walk to downtown Lafayette.

We had a wonderful stay. Cold outside during our visit but house was cozy. Great, well-sized and equipped kitchen with a small round table that seats four. There was an additional small round folding table in the laundry room with two more chairs so we could squeeze in five for a dinner. QR code reader on your phone is needed to get instructions on how to use the stove and history of the house. No sitting space downstairs but two very roomy bedrooms with fun reading nooks upstairs and beds for five people. Two single beds in one room and a double and single bed in the other. As other reviews have said, bathroom upstairs has a low ceiling over the sink. I am 6-3 and was just careful. I was very impressed with how quickly Dennis responded to my question early on a Sunday morning when none of the outlets worked in the kitchen. He got back to me in minutes on how to reset the ground-fault switch over the kitchen table. The neighborhood has a large range of interesting architecture so make sure to leave time to wander around. The house is an easy walk to downtown. We will definitely stay here again.
Dennis was a very responsive host and it was a great experience staying at the house!
Very smooth no issues
Relaxing place to stay!
Great location, very close to downtown hot spots and close to campus! Check-in was very easy.

Very cute house. Private entrance and driveway at the back of the house. Kitchen was very well equipped. The house is walking distance to downtown Lafayette and a short drive to the Purdue campus.
As other guests have mentioned, there is no common living space, just a kitchen and 2 bedrooms. So may not be great for larger families.
Great location for the Purdue game!

Very clean, great and prompt communication from host, and a very honest listing — but a very quirky and fairly uncomfortable layout. This is all clear in the description listing, but just be prepared. You’ve got no place to hang out but the kitchen, and you will likely be ducking your head in the bathroom. Steep and tight staircase. If you’re coming to sleep in the bedrooms after spending your days out, certainly a clean and safe place to rest.
This is a great place for a girls weekend! The host was very responsive to our questions. Very comfortable and relaxing. I also like the fact it was close to the town for restaurants

This is an upstairs sleepingarea and bathroom with a kitchen downstairs. There's no living area, but room in the kitchen to sit and a very cool vintage gas stove, and vintage kitchen sink. The bedrooms are spacious and the bathroom roomy. Nicely remodeled....close to restaurants.

Described as a family accommodation but in November is very cold, has no lounge TV for family gathering. Quite clean though quite a lot of hair shavings were left in the bathroom sink on the vertical surface closest to the guest. Best to arrive in daylight if parking at the rear, close to the entrance. It is hard to identify the property from the back in the dark. Due to low temperatures inside in cold weather, warmer weather stays would more agreeable.
Charming! Quiet and cozy, the kitchen was incredible
Great, warm, inviting space super close to downtown.
Needed somewhere to stay after arriving in town late and it was absolutely perfect! beautiful architecture and design

Nice, clean space. Ideal for friends gathering on Purdue game day. Comfortable sleeping. No gathering space to hang out though other than kitchen. No living room/sitting room, but was ok b/c we didn’t spend any time other than sleeping and getting ready in mornings.

It was very clean and close to campus! Dennis was prompt with responding and gave us wonderful restaurant suggestions!
Check in/out was vey easy. It was a nice place to stay.
Host are very accommodating and responsive. The place is very nice, clean, and in a good location if you are visiting the University

great place
great location
clean and private on a pretty side of the city
great place in a quiet town. as expected, would recommend
Good place to stay. Great communication and flexibility. Thanks.

Great location, great space, very clean. As stated in the description, no common seating space or television. Only minor issue for me was the low ceiling height in the bathroom - I am 6'1 and could not stand up straight without hitting my head.
Had an awesome stay here! Loved the history and character of the house. Hosts were flexible and very communicative

We rented the space to attend a Purdue game, and it worked perfectly for our needs. We would stay here again.
Great stay and had everything we needed.
Super cute place to stay - the place is much more spacious than in the pictures. Hosts were friendly and responsive. Parking was easy.
Super clean, lots of beds if you have a family, and great check-in communication. Easy walk to all the food and bars on Main St. Really nice!
This is the perfect place for visiting Purdue. Close proximity to the best restaurants and coffee shops in the area. Highly recommended!
Perfect stay and great location for Purdue family!
One of the sweetest people I’ve ever met. She was great. The area around town was also perfect!

This was an amazing place. I loved the decor and the beds were super comfortable and clean. The area is so cute and the nature surrounding is so beautiful. I would definitely book again if in the area.

This was my second time in this special space and I have another stay booked for August. I feel right at home, love being close to Main Street & Purdue and just love the style and feel of the space. It’s perfect for me. Victoria is so responsive and helpful and I am happy to have found this home away from home.
Vicky's place is my favorite Airbnb in Lafayette. Staying at her place feels like winning a lottery, because it's always full-booked! I love every piece of the house and I'm just so happy to be back.
Great place!
An adorable little space for a quick trip to visit family. Host was very friendly and the space was cozy and very cute!

I love the small town charm of Lafayette, and this place is the perfect place to experience it! Clean, quiet and super comfortable! Victoria’s carriage house was perfect for visiting Purdue and Lafayette. 2 min walk to restaurants and coffee shops. Victoria was extremely responsive and gave great food recommendations. Will definitely return!!

We had a wonderful stay in this cute cottage! It was clean and thoughtfully stocked with the essentials. The only issue was limited street parking one of the days we were there. Victoria was friendly and available!

The carriage house is artistically decorated. Attractive, charming and comfortable.

Great place, convenient location, as advertised!
This place was absolutely wonderful for my weekend visit to Lafayette. Victoria was communicative, helpful, and the place was really fun and beautiful. It had everything I needed!
Had a great stay. Perfect location. The bed was really comfortable. Victoria was a great host, super sweet and very responsive. I would love to stay again.

This was our 3rd stay at Vicky’s adorable Air BnB. We love how easy it is to get into town for restaurants and just walking around. It was also nice to have the church right there — we heard the church bells and were able to pop right over for mass.
We will be back!
Great place steps away from everything. Thank you!
Charming place in a great location. Host is friendly and responsive. Highly recommend!

Beautiful recently renovated carriage house centrally located to downtown and steps from restaurants, coffee shops, etc. Really great space, comfortable and nicely furnished. Easy parking and keyless access was a breeze.

I booked for a month for work, a month I won't forget .
Victoria's stay and service have far exceeded my expectations.
Since my arrival I felt at home, not only for its warm and cozy atmosphere (I love the small living room on the top floor, I have spent very pleasant times in that comfortable armchair) but also for the attention and predisposition both of Victoria and her daughter Jenny, which made that first month of adaptation so hard for a new arrival from Spain.
The location is unbeatable within walking distance of downtown in a quiet and charming neighborhood.
I would have extended my stay if it had been possible and of course I will repeat!
I can only thank Victoria and her family for their hospitality and generosity.

This is our 2nd time staying here! It is very clean and comfortable. We will stay here again.
Victorias place was so cozy and beautiful. Enjoyed my stay!
Terrific place to stay. Cute and cozy.
