Victoria’s place was clean and matches exactly like the picture shows. She was patient to answer any questions we had!

So glad we stayed here for my son’s graduation from Purdue University.
Home was clean, spacious and the host thought of everything we might need - including an umbrella which came in handy. Highly recommend Victoria’s little “home away from home”.
Thanks Vicky!

What a warm, cute, cozy, and safe place! Artsy decor, plenty of space, and I love the extra living room space upstairs. Vicky was a wonderful host and I'm glad we had time to sit down together and have a conversation. Book this one; you will love it!
Charming, quiet and clean! Great stay...

Very clean and charming house, private and peaceful- and everything you need is there. Vicky is kind and very responsive. Highly recommended. I will come back! (easy parking, easy access to the small shopping strip)

Thanks so much. Perfect stay. Will hopefully get a chance to book again
it was great! recommend it!

We loved it! It was unique, clean, spacious and comfortable!
I have already recommended it to friends! We will be back!
This was perfect for our week long stay in Lafayette! Comfortable, clean and convenient. We will definitely return.

Very friendly, responsive and clear instructions, great accommodations. Loved the stay and definitely worth it!!
Great little carriage house, beautiful area with historic houses in area.
Was an amazing stay. The place is very cute and charming!
This was a great choice to make in the Lafayette area. House was clean and instructions were clear, plenty of space, and accessible to nearby activities. Would stay again the next time I visit.
The place was lovely and Vicky is the nicest host. Definitely can recommend.

Always a pleasure to stay at Victoria’s beautiful place when I’m in town! So clean and nicely decorated, with everything you could need. Lovely home away from home.

I really enjoyed my time in this relaxing and creative space!

After a 5 day drive cross country, arrived in Lafayette to move my daughter into an apartment as she will be grad student at Purdue. Very nice place.
Such a cute place! Loved it and will be back again!

Great place - location is perfect!

We loved the place so much. Can’t wait to come back and visit.

My stay at Victorias was amazing! I was traveling alone and felt incredibly safe. I could have stayed there forever! I loved watching a movie and cooking in the kitchen! Victoria was great and I absolutely would stay here again!

Very quaint and comfortable. Clean and inviting. One of the better Airbnbs we have stayed in. Would return 100%.

I’m a repeat client. Victoria makes everything easy and welcoming. From the instructions at check in to the coffee/tea station for breakfast. All cotton sheets and towels. The location is wonderful whether you’re headed to campus or looking for an evening downtown. Looking forward to my next visit.

I especially appreciated the French Press and grinder with a supply of whole beans (Ethiopian, I’m guessing?). A very comfortable stay!
Very cute place to stay close to old Lafayette.
Great place to stay and amazing coffee

I had a pleasant stay at Vicky's quaint, spacious carriage house. The place was as described, the street was nicely quiet, and Vicky graciously accommodated my request for a late check-out. I would happily stay here again.
Great space to stay when visiting Lafayette
Victoria is a great host. The place seems to have been recently updated and is very nice.
the place was super clean and cozy. the bed was super comfortable. the restaurants in the neighborhood were awesome, and Victoria was an excellent host!

Relaxing space, convenient location.

We are so pleased with this quiet and cozy place for our long stay. And we are really appreciated for Vicky's thoughtfulness and hospitality. We had a wonderful time here!
Excellent place! Victoria went above and beyond. Place has everything you’ll need. Highly recommend.

Beautiful quaint carriage house in old downtown just a block from trendy restaurants and handy for driving about the area to sites of interest. The French Press works wonderfully! Great parking on the quiet street near the door. I'll need to bring my bride back for a visit!

The coziest place! The personal touches were so nice after a long day of travel. Bedroom is upstairs with bathroom downstairs. The stairs added so much character to the Carriage House! We will return :-)

Vicky’s carriage is a great home away from home. Love love this space and Vicky too, and will stay again in the future!

Victoria's place is absolutely lovely. It's so comfy and cozy. Everything was clean and the furnishings are well taken care of.

very cute place loved it!!
